remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2007.)
statement:
csbie2t.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
csbie2t.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
csbie2.3 $e |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> C = D ) $.
csbie2 $p |- [_ A / x ]_ [_ B / y ]_ C = D $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d D x y $.
